channel.title: The Making of the Best Server Ever?
channel.description:
[center][b][size=13pt]This Topic is about the Best Server you Will Probley EVER see I will Post ALL my Progress and every detail[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://3.UploadMirror.com/uploaded/3/565/banner_break_05_04_2007_03_09_28_47350.gif[/img][/center]
PROGRESS! CLIENT: |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| SERVER: ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
Im Starting again Today Im Using Satans Isle, Its Guna be Satans Tower, Much like Satans Isle. Except in the Slayer Tower!!! Its guna have stuff on all Levels and is going to Be a Huge Server
The Idea of the Server is to make it The most Realistic Server EVER! Im going to add ALL of the stats as FULLY as Posible I will Try Add as Many RuneScape Mini Games As Posible (Like Castle Wars, Full Staking, And lots more) And Even all the Small Details, Like Enchanting Jewelllery I Need your Support People, A Simple Post like "I Support you" Will get you on the List This will Also Bump the Topic Letting more People See the New Private Server, Nothing Like Anyother. I will Make A list In-Game of the List of Supporters.
[b]List of Accomplishments:[/b] Adding Moving/Objects. Make Slayer Tower Safe. Move/Modify/Add Shops. Remove all Item Adding Commands. Change NPCs Hp and Change XP when Fighting NPCs.
[b]List of Things Im going to Do:[/b] (In Order.) Spawn NPCs. Add as Many Mini-Games as Posible. Add as Many Skills as Posible. Fix Bugs Add Full Specs with Every Weapon, and Real Spec Bars Add any Good Tuts I can Find.
[b]Supporters List:[/b]
[ul][li]Hiaburi[/li] [li]Hippyss[/li] [li]Jonaske[/li] [li]Nacho[/li] [li]Gr4v1ty Pk3r[/li] [li]Soule[/li] [li]Jordan7[/li] [li]Ikick[/li][/ul]

item.title: The Making of the Best Server Ever?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“stone cold, post:41, topic:86688”][quote author=† Nirvana † link=topic=127154.msg1236567#msg1236567 date=1177858681]

You said “voids”. Correct term: Methods.

The servers we have now are not the brightest we have had. The only fully working/almost bug free sources are rs-scape, drugscape.

They weren’t like runescape but more unique.

lol… thats why it says “public void”
[/quote]
void means hollow/nothing.[/quote]
yes, like a hole, or bucket, the are ment to hold things, and what they are ment to hold is not nothing

Read full topic
